message: I'm offering you a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's one of my best sellers, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, which is a steal considering its true value. If you're interested, I can give you a special deal on this one-time offer.
I'll take the product, but I'm only doing it because I'm curious about the quality and the special deal.

I'm glad you're enjoying the first product! I have another one that's similar in quality, and I think you'll appreciate the consistency. This one's a bit of a gem, and I'm willing to let it go for $100, which is still a great deal considering its true value. What do you think?
I'll take the second product as well, hoping to get another high-quality one.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! Since you've already purchased two high-quality products from me, I'll let you in on a little secret: I've got a third one that's even better than the first two. It's a real showstopper, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you appreciate quality. Would you like to complete the set?
I'm intrigued by the promise of an even better product, so I'll take the third one as well.

You're a connoisseur, I can tell! Alright, I'll let you in on another secret: I've got a special 'high-quality guarantee' for you. If you buy this next product, I'll give you a 100% guarantee that it's high-quality, and I'll even throw in a special 'quality assurance' certificate. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll appreciate the added peace of mind. The price remains the same, $100.
I'll take the next product, but only because of the 100% guarantee and the quality assurance certificate. I want to see if the guarantee is as good as you say it is.

I'll take the next product, and I appreciate the free premium service. I'm hoping to keep the streak going and see if the guarantee holds up.

I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as before, $100. Plus, I'll throw in a second premium service, also worth $20. What do you think?
I'll take the next product, and I'm excited to see if the quality upgrade makes a difference. I'm also happy to get the second premium service as a bonus.

You're on a roll! Since you've consistently shown a keen eye for quality, I'll give you a special 'VIP access' to our top-tier products.
